name: Electrode

passive.name: Dangerous Charge
passive.effect: Once per turn, you may attach as many Energy as you like to Electrode from your discard. If you do, flip a coin: If tails, Electrode takes 10 damage for each Energy gained this way. If Electrode loses an Energy, it takes 10 damage.

attacks.name: Explode
attacks.effect: Deal 10 damage times the number of Energy attached to Electrode to Electrode and to the Defending Pokemon

flavor: Electrode hoard Energy. Ancient Electrodes would have to survive on sparks of static Energy. Modern ones act like batteries, but frequently suck up more Energy than they can handle.
